resources.string: Confused on what these buttons do? or how they function?
When clicked you can erase your drawing(The size tool works on the eraser aswell). To get off eraser use the color select tools.
When clicked it will bring you to a place where you can enter the name of drawing and it pulls up that perticular drawing for the user
When clicked it will pull up all saved drawing of the users, along with their names.
A menu to explain the functions of this app
When clicked it will undo your last stroke to the canvas
When clicked it will prompt you to enter a file name. Once a name is enter the image is saved to your saved drawings(Click again to close)
When clicked a menu will appear showing a array of colors. Choose a color and draw away!
When clicked a slider will appear, allowing you to set your pen size.(Click a second time to close)
Unable to find that drawing(Please be sure to check your capitalization)
Please Enter the name of the drawing your looking for:
